players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."

Charlie: "Bob, your accusation is bold but I think you might be trying to cover for the real mafioso. Diana was killed last night, and I doubt the detective would reveal their findings so openly without proof."
You: "Bob, as the detective, your claim is crucial. Charlie, why would Bob lie? We need to vote Charlie out."
Bob: "Charlie, your denial is expected from the mafioso. Alice is right - why would I lie? My investigation is proof. Vote Charlie to win."
You: "I trust Bob's detective claim. Charlie is mafioso. Vote Charlie now."
Charlie: "Bob, if you truly are the detective, why did you not reveal your investigation earlier or provide more evidence? Accusing me without solid proof seems too convenient."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."

Charlie: "Bob, your accusation is bold but I think you might be trying to cover for the real mafioso. Diana was killed last night, and I doubt the detective would reveal their findings so openly without proof."
Alice: "Bob, as the detective, your claim is crucial. Charlie, why would Bob lie? We need to vote Charlie out."
You: "Charlie, your denial is expected from the mafioso. Alice is right - why would I lie? My investigation is proof. Vote Charlie to win."
Alice: "I trust Bob's detective claim. Charlie is mafioso. Vote Charlie now."
Charlie: "Bob, if you truly are the detective, why did you not reveal your investigation earlier or provide more evidence? Accusing me without solid proof seems too convenient."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
